events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund request because the customer is asking for money back.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! Iâ€™m Maria from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. Let me assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund within 3 business days and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the prompt help! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund and return label.
The refund request has been processed and the return label emailed to the customer. Issue is now resolved.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today and everything looks good now. Thanks for the excellent customer service!
We are closing this case as the refund was successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
